.
Action to Take Upon Receipt of DD Form 214
Following receipt of
DD Form 214
or other credible evidence showing a Veteran has been released from active duty,
ensure VA properly discontinued benefits effective the day the Veteran returned to active duty, and
notify the Veteran that VA will reinstate benefits effective the day following release from active duty if the Veteran submits a request for reinstatement within one year of that date.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B  - Award Adjustments Necessitated by a Veteran's Return to and Discharge From Active Duty
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 2, Section B
